content: this classic beanie was made to match michael pullover you ll need appx 60-220yds of knitpicks mighty stitch worsted 1 weight yarn size 7 4 5mm circular and dpn needles a stitch marker and a yarn needle to weave in ends and close up the top you will need to know the knit purl ssk k2tog and will need to know how to knit in the round the pattern comes in newborn baby toddler child small adult large adult permission is granted to sell what you make from the pattern download this free pattern here 2 1 https //shrsl com/3z0yz 2 https //amandammorse com/free-knitting-pattern-michael-beanie/
